entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then northwest 20 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
